div.pre: 474 Yenikeui, near Amphipolis, Macedonia, (1175) 1899 Burial: c. 175-165 B.C. (T) Contents: 13 AR. Pot hoard Philip V: 1 didr. Macedonia: 2 tetrob. Histiaea: 3 tetrob. Rhodes: 7 dr. Disposition: Paris Perdrizet, RN 1903, p. 324 Robert, Ã‰tudes, p. 206
